definition: peak/apex/world best/number one/finest (competitors)/top (figures in a certain field)

apex/crown of the head/top/roof/most/to carry on the head/to push to the top/to go against/to replace/to substitute/to be subjected to (an aerial bombing, hailstorm etc)/(slang) to "bump" a forum thread to raise its profile/classifier for headwear, hats, veils etc
erhua variant of 頂尖|顶尖[ding3 jian1]

sentences.english: Attica is defined by avantgarde design and top-notch sound from a world-class system.
sentences.chinese: 愛奇多被評爲設計前衛且音響設備頂尖的俱樂部。

sentences.english: Many top players from around the world earn big money playing in America’s NBA.
sentences.chinese: 很多頂尖的運動員通過在美國NBA中打球掙大錢。

sentences.english: Many top athletes can consume up to twice what a normal preson would eat.
sentences.chinese: 許多頂尖運動員消耗掉的食物是正常所喫食物的兩倍。

sentences.english: The biggest frameless cabinetry manufacturer in north America. The choice of the world's richest man.
sentences.chinese: 北美最頂尖的現代櫥櫃品牌，世界首富的選擇。

sentences.english: However, the top-performing tester isn't satisfied with the typical product quality assessment.
sentences.chinese: 然而，頂尖的測試人員不滿足於典型的產品質量評估。

sentences.english: Jacky Chen is the king of the hill in Hongkong's film industry.
sentences.chinese: 成龍是香港電影圈裏最頂尖的人物。

sentences.english: Five of the world’s top architects are competing to design it.
sentences.chinese: 五位世界頂尖建築師正在爲新館的設計展開競爭。

sentences.english: China has overtaken Japan as Asias number one nation for producing top universities.
sentences.chinese: 中國已經超過日本，成爲亞洲頂尖大學最多的國家。

sentences.english: Find articles "and" products to "other" products, a leading low-carb.
sentences.chinese: 查找文章和產品名單其他頂尖低碳水化合物產品。

sentences.english: VII. The award scheme is covered by the NCKU English Eagle Project.
sentences.chinese: 本獎勵經費由頂尖大學成英計畫經費項下支付。

sentences.english: They are the leaders of society.
sentences.chinese: 他們是上流社會的頂尖人物。

sentences.english: For years it had been my sole purpose to get accepted into a top institution.
sentences.chinese: 之前的許多年，進一個頂尖的大學是我唯一的目標。

sentences.english: And I congratulate him on being the best at what he does.
sentences.chinese: 我對他成爲自己領域裏的頂尖好手錶示祝賀。

sentences.english: Yoshikatsu heart so that she was always excellence, and strive to achieve top.
sentences.chinese: 好勝心讓她不斷地精益求精，努力做到最頂尖。

sentences.english: And no top university will admit cheaters.
sentences.chinese: 而且沒有一所頂尖的大學會收作弊的學生。

sentences.english: The list I've compiled are ten of the best country music debut albums.
sentences.chinese: 我編集的列表是十大頂尖鄉村音樂的最新專輯。

definition: domestic and international/at home and abroad
Asia/abbr. for 亞細亞洲|亚细亚洲[Ya4 xi4 ya4 Zhou1]
